title: 1967 Chevrolet 60 Dump Truck
item_description:

    • RECORD NOT ON FILE

Note: The VIN and License plate was searched in DMV records, no record was found. However, the seller does have the title. Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the re-registration, inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
